page.title: 07A MILK-MAN IN BURWELL.
page.content: My dad is a{village milk-man.}He gets up between 4.00 a.m. and 5.00 a.m. and works for Bridge Farm Dairies. He sells gold-top,silver-top and red- top milk.He also sells drink, apples, potatoes, yoghurt etc.His{head {quarters}is in{Newmarket}but there is also a bigger depot in{Mildenhall.}He sometimes has an{electric van.}On Friday nights he goes out collecting the money and he has a transit van because it is quicker.At{Christmas time people sometimes give him {presents.}He goes round in his little van delivering the milk and putting it on people's doorsteps.He is very friendly and popular with his customers.
